pullrequest.title: Port SDF Filesystem to Ignition Common

content.raw: In terms of the functions in Filesystem.cc, it seems to me like we should either a) implement them using the primitives from FilesystemBoost.cc, or b) replace the calls throughout the rest of the library with just the ones from FilesystemBoost.  The latter may not be possible because of backwards-compatibility concerns, but in that case, using FilesystemBoost.cc as primitives would allow this to work better on Windows.  It would also get rid of some duplicate code and duplicate #ifdef WIN32 sections in the code.
